attributes.action: Maximum Price of Car insurance to be limited for young drivers
attributes.additional_details:
I believe we should allow more people the chance to drive on our roads by limiting the maximum price an insurance company can charge customers. If someone has an accident they should then have to set up an agreemet with the insurare to pay for example £1,000 in fees.

This will stop good young drivers from paying extreme prices and never needing to access the soliciters or claims department.
attributes.background: Premiums should be capped so insurance companies cannot capitalise on the age of a driver.
